message.body: I concur vehemently. To that end, are you guys settled enough in your new place that I could perhaps visit in October, before Boston turns into a tundra until May?
YES! We are in the final settling process (picture hanging) and would love to see you
The weekend of the 19th/20th I'll be in ##, otherwise we are totally free
Hmm. How about if I came up late on the 4th and left in the morning on the 6th? Too soon?
Sweet. Let me look into train/flight prices and I'll let you know what turns up :-)
P.S. Amtrak has gotten ridiculously expensive. Wtf
Yeah I looked into it for my DC trip and it was completely insane, flying is like less than half as much
